body.name: KE KING Water Saving 0.8/1.28 GPF High Efficient Dual-Flush Elongated One-Piece Toilet with Comfort Chair Seat ADA Height, Sleek White Toilet Bowl

byLineInfo.name: Visit the KK KE KING Store

features: Made of premium vitreous china, nice glazed surface inhibits the growth of stain- and odor on the surface
Siphon Flushing: Super quiet and powerful flush with no clogs. High efficiency (1.28gpf/4.8lpf) operation is water sense certified.
Slow-close toilet seat, no slamming, and no danger of pinching fingers.
"2" fully-glazed trap-way with 100% factory flush tested.
Unit ships ready to install: Package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instructions

100% Quality Assurance: KE KING is committed to providing the best user experience, if you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us first. Our quick response support team is always there.
body.description: KE KING Dual-Flush Elongated One-Piece Toilet Luxurious modern design one-piece elongated toilet offers a seamless design with a fully skirted bowl creating a modern design for any bathroom. It has a completely smooth surface, very easy to wipe down. The dual-flush function can save water without sacrificing excellent performance, not only economically but EP. It's the best choice for your stylish and elegant modern bathroom.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us KE KING's story began with a dream to provide people with the best bathroom experience possible. Our dedication to excellence has led us to produce a range of products that are not only functional but also beautiful. We've taken a simple concept and turned it into a global brand that's synonymous with quality and luxury. KE KING has everything you need to transform your bathroom into a sanctuary of relaxation and luxury.

HOME, LOVE, LIFE We are committed to providing a 100% satisfactory customer experience. If the product you receive is damaged during transportation, there is no need to return it. Please DM us first. We will send you the replacement or credit. KE KING Dual-Flush Elongated One-Piece Toilet Luxurious modern design one-piece elongated toilet offers a seamless design with a fully skirted bowl creating a modern design for any bathroom. It has a completely smooth surface, very easy to wipe down. The dual-flush function can save water without sacrificing excellent performance, not only economically but EP. It's the best choice for your stylish and elegant modern bathroom.

High Efficient Flush A highly efficient dual-flush toilet allows you to proactively conserve water by selecting 0.8 GPF or higher(1.28gpf). Estimating, that 4,000 gallons of water can be saved annually in a residential household that employs dual flush toilets. Soft Closing Toilet Seat Compared to noisy traditional toilet seats, a soft close seat creates almost no noise, making it a great choice to ensure privacy in your bathroom. No need to worry about slamming or pinching fingers. And the bumpers prevent the seat from shifting during use and add stability. High Quality Inside 2" fully-glazed trap-way with 100% factory flush tested. This siphon-flush one-piece toilet uses a state-of-the-art all-glass flush system to give you a super quiet and powerful flush. NO clogs, NO leaks.

Quick-Release Toilet Seat Quick-Release seats can be unlatched from the toilet for easy removal and convenient cleaning; no tools are required. Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose This supply line inlet hose of the toilet works for the U.S. standard 7/8'' waterline. An adapter for a 1/2'' waterline is pre-installed. If your supply line size is 7/8", please screw off the adapter, then connect it. Suggested Inlet Valve Location Please note the installation of the full-skirted toilet design. Please select the correct toilet for installation according to the position of the water valve. Incorrect water valve position will cause the toilet to fail to install. It is recommended that the distance of the water valve position. The dimension in the main picture has accurate dimensions for reference only.

Technical Details Certification cUPC, Watersense, ADA Complaint, ASME A112.19.2/CSA B45.1 Compliant Toilet seat material PP Toilet bowl material Vitreous China Seat height 16 1/2 inches Rough in 12 inches Trapway Diameter 2 inches Flush Valve Diameter 2 inches Trip Lever Placement Top, Chrome-Plated Buttons MaP Rating 800g Water Consumption Dual Flush: 0.8/1.28 GPF Flushing technology Siphonic Jet After-sales Service 24 Hours Online & Answer Your Questions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product! 10/10 would recommend this toilet to everyone 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazon give cards
reviews.reviewText: Do not purchase Amazon gift cards. The fraud department is not responsive and you will spend most of your time on the phone talking to multiple people like parrots. Do not buy amazon give cards!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good condition
reviews.reviewText: Very good condition and helps me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This has a plastic cover
reviews.reviewText: I'm sending it back. It has a cheap plastic cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product description/Picture do not match
reviews.reviewText: The picture given for this product shows a closed back. This would be easy to clean. However the back is fully open, and difficult to keep things out of. The picture is misleading. Otherwise a functional toilet, at least for now.
